SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc26
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.network.socket.server

Class VirtualSocketView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc26.network.socket.server.VirtualSocketView
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualView, Remote
public class VirtualSocketView extends Object implements VirtualView
This class contains the methods that can be called from the server to be executed on the client. Implementation for socket network connection.
